title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

[Submitted by Chris Mills, who writes: “I don't know what your position is on graffiti, but I enjoyed the following sequence on a bathroom cubicle wall.”]

First graffitor: Imagination is more important than knowlege. Albert Einstein
Second graffitor: But spelling helps, if your a journalist.
Third graffitor: But Its all the same.

[All errors, of course, sic!]
